OpenProject 11.0.3

We released OpenProject 11.0.3. The release contains several bug fixes and we recommend updating to the newest version.

Bug fixes and changes

  • Fixed: Bulk edit: Custom field long text cut off [#34829]
  • Fixed: “Estimates and time” not translated to German when not logged in on community.openproject.com [#35009]
  • Fixed: IFC viewer can’t load models when OP installed on subpath [#35129]
  • Fixed: Elder BIM instances get “OpenProject” theme instead of the “OpenProject BIM” theme after migration. [#35131]
  • Fixed: Transitive Relations embedded in work package representer -> poor performance [#35168]
  • Fixed: LDAP Group sync deletes users when removed from group [#35265]
